channel.title: Help with compiler!
channel.description:
I dont understand what I'm doin wrong, but here it goes Im tryin 2 compile and im gettin this error...
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
To compile it im usin this...
@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Im usin this as my system Variables "classpath"
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"
"PATH"
C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"
Im using Ultimate PK, but I have used other one's and I am gettin the same error. Ive also tried using this in my Compile script...
@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause
If anyone has any help it would be kindly appreciated. Thank-you [center][glow=red,2,300]HAPPY NEW YEARS!!![/glow][/center]

item.title: Help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Msvatk Msvatk
item.description:
@Msvatk wrote:

ty 4 ur help dude but i worked it out, man im an idiot…

used this

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and when i ran moparscape i change my PORT!!! to 5555, man i feel like an idiot hahaha, oh well im tired

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Oh. I thought it said “Some input files” not stream.java. :o :o :o

The correct solution to your problem should be actually be to recompile with the option -Xlint.

Recompile with the java option -Xlint:deprecation for details.

It will tell you what method has been obsoleted. The API for the obsolete method will (usually) tell you what to use as a replacement.

Read full topic

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

This means everything worked correctly. Congrats!

item.title: Help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Msvatk Msvatk
item.description:
@Msvatk wrote:

I dont understand what I’m doin wrong, but here it goes

Im tryin 2 compile and im gettin this error…

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

To compile it im usin this…

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Im usin this as my system Variables

“classpath”

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"

“PATH”

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"

Im using Ultimate PK, but I have used other one’s and I am gettin the same error.

Ive also tried using this in my Compile script…

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

If anyone has any help it would be kindly appreciated.

Thank-you
